Info.Title: Jai Ho
Info.Writer: A.R. Murugadoss (story), Dilip Shukla (screenplay and dialogue)
Info.Actors: Salman Khan, Daisy Shah, Tabu, Danny Denzongpa
Info.Plot: An ex-army officer initiates a unique idea of propagating social responsibility among ordinary people and in doing so, crosses paths with a powerful political family.
